title: Developing Teams Through Adaptive Learning and Coaching

messages.content: Can you identify the basic components of these three tiers and make it clearer what the offer is and rewrite them outputted as a nice markdown table? Tier 1, The Basics Engagement: 3 weeks • Intro info by email • Pre-workshop assessments • 2 hour participatory online workshop reviewing challenges, priorities, goals, and setting action plans … and direct focused adaptive learning during the workshop • Two weeks of self-guided implementation • Follow-on 2 hour participatory online workshop, reviewing progress, and setting next-stage action plans _Week 1: Conduct pre-workshop assessments and host a 2-hour online workshop to discuss challenges, priorities, and set initial action plans._ Week 2: Participants engage in self-guided implementation of the action plans. _Week 3: Conduct a follow-up 2-hour online workshop to review progress and set next-stage action plans. $5800 Tier 2, The Standard Engagement: 5 weeks Basics program, plus: 1 additional group session 2 weeks later plus A 40-minute 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 people on your team. or A 2-hour intro train-the-trainer workshop to improve facilitation/online facilitation skills on your team plus help people from your team continue supporting your team using Bloom’s assessments and library._ TOT trainer observation sessions deliver a workshop or session, and provide them with written feedback post-session. _Weeks 1-3: Follow the same structure as Tier 1._ Week 4: Host an additional group session for further learning and progress evaluation. _Week 5: Either conduct a 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 team members or a train-the-trainer workshop, depending on the chosen option. This includes observing the trainees and providing written feedback post-session. $12,500 Tier 3, Deep Learning Engagement: 10 weeks Standard program, plus: 3 month program, 6 group sessions total plus 2 x 40-minute 1-on-1 coaching sessions for up to 5 people on your team. or 2 x 2-hour train-the-trainer workshops to improve facilitation/online facilitation skills on your team plus help people from your team continue supporting your team using Bloom’s assessments and library._ Includes 2 TOT facilitation observation sessions, facilitator certificates, and guidance in follow-on program design. (Additional support for implementation is optional.) _Weeks 1-5: Follow the same structure as Tier 2._ Weeks 6-10: Extended program with an additional group session every two weeks, making six in total. Conduct either two 1-on-1 coaching sessions for up to 5 team members or two train-the-trainer workshops, depending on the chosen option. This includes two observation sessions, facilitator certificates, and guidance in program design. Optional additional support for implementation is available during this period. $24,000

Tier 1, The Basics Engagement: 3 weeks • Intro info by email • Pre-workshop assessments • 2 hour participatory online workshop reviewing challenges, priorities, goals, and setting action plans … and direct focused adaptive learning during the workshop • Two weeks of self-guided implementation • Follow-on 2 hour participatory online workshop, reviewing progress, and setting next-stage action plans _Week 1: Conduct pre-workshop assessments and host a 2-hour online workshop to discuss challenges, priorities, and set initial action plans._ Week 2: Participants engage in self-guided implementation of the action plans. _Week 3: Conduct a follow-up 2-hour online workshop to review progress and set next-stage action plans. $5800 Tier 2, The Standard Engagement: 5 weeks Basics program, plus: 1 additional group session 2 weeks later plus A 40-minute 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 people on your team. or A 2-hour intro train-the-trainer workshop to improve facilitation/online facilitation skills on your team plus help people from your team continue supporting your team using Bloom’s assessments and library._ TOT trainer observation sessions deliver a workshop or session, and provide them with written feedback post-session. _Weeks 1-3: Follow the same structure as Tier 1._ Week 4: Host an additional group session for further learning and progress evaluation. _Week 5: Either conduct a 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 team members or a train-the-trainer workshop, depending on the chosen option. This includes observing the trainees and providing written feedback post-session. $12,500 Tier 3, Deep Learning Engagement: 10 weeks Standard program, plus: 3 month program, 6 group sessions total plus 2 x 40-minute 1-on-1 coaching sessions for up to 5 people on your team. or 2 x 2-hour train-the-trainer workshops to improve facilitation/online facilitation skills on your team plus help people from your team continue supporting your team using Bloom’s assessments and library._ Includes 2 TOT facilitation observation sessions, facilitator certificates, and guidance in follow-on program design. (Additional support for implementation is optional.) _Weeks 1-5: Follow the same structure as Tier 2._ Weeks 6-10: Extended program with an additional group session every two weeks, making six in total. Conduct either two 1-on-1 coaching sessions for up to 5 team members or two train-the-trainer workshops, depending on the chosen option. This includes two observation sessions, facilitator certificates, and guidance in program design. Optional additional support for implementation is available during this period. $24,000

messages.content:
Here is a markdown table summarizing the three tiers: | Tier | Engagement Duration | Offer | |:-:|:-:|:-:| |Tier 1: The Basics|3 weeks|
  • Intro email
  • Pre-workshop assessments
  • 2 hour online workshop
  • 2 weeks self-guided implementation
  • Follow-on 2 hour workshop
|$5,800 | |Tier 2: The Standard |5 weeks |
  • Basics program
  • Additional group session
  • 40 min 1-on-1 coaching (up to 5 people) **or**
  • 2 hour train-the-trainer workshop
  • TOT observation session & feedback
|$12,500| |Tier 3: Deep Learning |10 weeks|
  • Standard program
  • 3 month program, 6 total group sessions
  • 2x 40 min 1-on-1 coaching (up to 5 people)**or**
  • 2x 2 hour train-the-trainer workshops
  • 2x TOT observation sessions
  • Facilitator certificates
  • Guidance for follow-on program design
|$24,000|

messages.content: Can you remove the HTML and give them nicer titles, also a bit more information?

content.text: Can you remove the HTML and give them nicer titles, also a bit more information?

messages.content:
Here is the updated markdown table with nicer titles and more details: |Tier|Title|Duration|Details|Price| |:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:| |1|The Essentials Workshop| 3 weeks|
  • Intro email with pre-work
  • 2 hour kickoff workshop to review challenges, priorities, and set initial action plans
  • 2 weeks of self-guided implementation of action plans
  • Follow-up 2 hour review workshop to evaluate progress and set next steps
|$5,800| |2|Workshop and Coaching|5 weeks|
  • Basics program
  • Additional 2 hour mid-point review session
  • 40 minute 1:1 coaching for up to 5 leaders
    • **or**
    • 2 hour virtual facilitation training for internal champions
    • Observation and feedback for trainees
    |$12,500| |3| Intensive Coaching and Mentorship|10 weeks|
    • Standard program
    • 3 month program with 6 total group sessions
    • 2 x 40 minute 1:1 coaching for up to 5 leaders
    • **or**
    • 2 x 2 hour virtual facilitation training for internal champions
    • 2x observation and feedback for trainees
    • Facilitator certification
    • Guidance for internal program development
    |$24,000|
